intro: Celebrate 25 years of The Original Moorhuhn Hunt! Play the iconic game that started it all and unlock the classic Moorhuhn Remake as a bonus.
description:
90 seconds to hunt as many chickens and collect as many points as possible. Beat your personal record and compete with players around the globe. 

But wait, there's more! Score over 800 points, and you'll unlock the full version of the classic Moorhuhn Remake.

Finally, you can enjoy this Moorhuhn classic, also known as Crazy Chicken and Chicken Hunter, featuring the wildest and most famous chicken in the world on modern devices. Step into the shoes of the chicken hunter. Move the screen left and right to find more chickens. Aim and shoot quickly to take down all the flying birds. The harder they are to hit, the more points you score!

The Original Moorhuhn Hunt is a great way to kill a few minutes or spend a few hours while challenging other players worldwide. The hunting season is open!

Note: Moorhuhn Remake is a reimagining of the classic Moorhuhn Remake game. It is distinct from the separately sold Moorhuhn Remake with Multiplayer available in the Nintendo eShop.
